title: Bollywood hunks who are rocking the silver screens right now
text:
There are Khans, Kapoors and the Kumars in Bollywood and then they’re also actors in this industry who have the same impact at the box-office who are called the rising superstars. Of late, Bollywood has seen the rise of many fine actors reaching the pedestal and making a mark for themselves.

These actors don’t need a big budget project or a big banner to back them, all they want is a great concept and they get their acting chops on the table. Moreover, these following actors have made a mark for themselves in such a short time that the audiences are amazed by them and they can’t get enough of them.

- Sponsored -

Here is a list of 5 actors that are totally in demand at the movies right now and rightfully so.

Kartik Aaryan

With absolute no connection to Bollywood, a complete outsider today reigns at the box-office like no one’s business. Kartik Aaryan had a great year in 2019 with two back to back hits with Luka Chuppi and Pati Patni Aur Woh. The actor had both his releases hitting the bull’s eye and raking in the moolah. Kartik Aaryan has proved himself in the last two years that he’s here to stay. He has earned a wide reach amidst the audience and he’s masses favourite. Kartik Aaryan is easily the massiest actor in tinsel town. Right from his dance steps to his hairstyle, everything is trending about him on social media. This actor is for the masses and by the masses, we surely want more of him!

Ayushmann Khurrana

Just the way a scientist keeps experimenting something new in his lab, Ayushmann Khurrana does the same with his roles every Friday. The actor has done some spectrum of characters in Bollywood and each one is completely different from the other. This year he had Article 15, Bala and Dreamgirl, three releases and all three different from others and three bonafide superhits. Ayushmann Khurrana has made not just our industry but the entire nation realize that content is King and if the right concept is narrated the right way, you surely have a winning lottery ticket in your hand. His bag is full of exciting offers and we’re curious about those big-screen treats.

Vicky Kaushal

Vicky Kaushal in his surprising act in Uri The Surgical Strike, made everyone sit back and take him seriously as an actor. Last year his act as Kamlesh in Sanju showed a different side of him as an artist and this year with Uri, it was a wake-up call for the filmmakers that he can carry a film on his shoulders and do a great job at it. Vicky Kaushal moreover enjoys supreme love and affection among the female audience. After all the Mills & Boons’ description of tall, dark and handsome is no just a myth.

Now, this actor is par excellence. Ranveer Singh has reinvented himself with each of his films. If he can play a warrior king, he can also transform into a street rapper. This actor has given a tough competition to his contemporaries and is not tired of giving great performances back-to-back. Off-screen, his love story is rocking and on-screen he’s making us fall in love with his movies and his rules.

If you have someone dancing alongside Hrithik Roshan and it’s difficult to keep your attention on Hrithik, then you surely have a superstar in the making. Tiger Shroff is one actor who times and again shows the industry and the audience, that he may fall but he rises 10 times higher. This year with his blockbuster release War, Tiger Shroff wasn’t just all about brawn and dance, he also got those acting chops to make a mark alongside Tiger Shroff. This young actor has proved his mettle several times and we are quite impressed.

Till then you guys stay tuned to this space for more updates, news, and gossip.
